comment.body: "Hopefully we will soon be able to easily create and use different ZeroIDs": there's now another ID provider at ZeroVerse.bit - see the tutorial here (1). One can e.g. select also this ID when voting at ZeroPolls.bit. (1) http://127.0.0.1:43110/zeroblog.bit/?Post:15:get+yourself+an+ID+@+ZeroVerse.bit

OK, would be great to have another tester. 

"Can people create more than one ZeroVerse.bit ID?" It's the same as for zeroID, only one account.

Now that I have commented on polls with text that doesn't fit, I'd need a delete/edit button. I should have started those comments with: "Testing new comment feature, please ignore!". Probably a feature for moderators to do the same would be nice also
animation: I remember it, but I don't remember if it animated for each of them :-( I didn't have my coffee yet
oh, such a long night... enjoy your coffee!
small text change: on the main page where all polls are shown: the comment summary says "1 comments". Could be better like: "1 comment" or ""1 comment(s)""
Also, I'd like to have the "8 comments" clickable: meaning, when I click on it, it opens the comment section. At begin, my mouse always moved automatically to there to open the comments
I'd like to "group" polls, e.g. by tag(s). Or add a search function, so I can search for a keyword myself

Also, it'd be great to have a summary of the ongoing things people reported (status of those then would also be nice, but not necessary)

If something is reported, I don't need to report again. 
Also, I'd save me the time to read through all the various blog entries for ZeroPoll and their comments

While making this (1) I wished there would be multi-select of answers possible (not only selecting 1 answer)
